TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CGLineJoin extends System.Enum

Docs.remarks: Specifies how to join consecutive line or curve segments in a figure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGLineJoin Bevel = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a beveled join. This produces a diagonal corner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGLineJoin Miter = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies a mitered join. This produces a sharp corner or a clipped corner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.CoreGraphics.CGLineJoin Round = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a circular join. This produces a circular arc between the lines.
